intro: Illicium sumatranum, commonly known as star anise, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its aromatic, star-shaped fruit that contains essential oils. The plant belongs to the family Schisandraceae and is closely related to the genus Illicium. Its leaves are typically alternate and have a smooth, glossy surface. The fruit is harvested when fully mature and is used in both culinary and medicinal applications.
